name: Tilligence
description:
- HOW TO PLAY -

Tilling + Diligence = Tilligence 
Fill the map with farms in the most efficient way

-

L-Click : Place
R-Click : Delete
WASD/Arrows : Set Rotation

-

Place a Barn, then place its Fields to make a Farm
Farms linked together form Communities

-

Place Fields in unoccupied positions next to their Barn
More Fields per Barn = higher efficiency

-

6 different Barns with different field sizes
Larger Fields = higher efficiency

-

Barns that are adjacent or connected by Roads form a Community
Larger Communities = higher efficiency

-

Rating is based on how efficiently
you use the space in the map
Each map has a par, but much higher ratings
can be achieved through optimisation!

-
If you're interested in how the score is calculated,
check out the PDF file in the downloads section
for a more in-depth explanation.
